about_the_game:
Discover Go Like Never Before!

Welcome to a world where strategy and skill meet in the ancient game of Go, now available at your fingertips. Simple, elegant, and endlessly engaging, our game makes mastering this classic game both accessible and enjoyable.

Play Your Way

Choose from a variety of board sizes, including the traditional 19x19 grid, as well as smaller 9x9 and 13x13 options, perfect for quick games or honing your skills. Every match, whether against our finely tuned AI or a friend, offers a new opportunity to learn, grow and win.

Features You’ll Love:

Easy Undos: Take back moves and refine your strategy.

Global Leaderboard: See how you stack up against players around the world.

Share Games: Easily share your favorite matches with friends.

Save/Load: Pick up your game right where you left off, anytime, anywhere.

Diverse AI Levels: From beginner to expert, enjoy matches that suit your skill level.

Timed Matches: Put your quick thinking to the test.

Join the World of Go

There’s a whole world of strategy waiting for you. With clean graphics, smooth gameplay, and intuitive features, getting into Go has never been easier or more enjoyable. Dive in, and discover the rich, rewarding game that has captivated minds for centuries.

Download the game today. Your journey into the intricate and fascinating world of Go starts now!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6
  • Processor: Apple or Intel
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 80 MB available space

name: Go

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7,8,10,11
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 80 MB available space

short_description: Classic Weiqi, Igo, Baduk, 圍棋 Discover Go Like Never Before! Welcome to a world where strategy and skill meet in the ancient game of Go, now available at your fingertips.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Vietnamese
